txt.en: You have enabled integrated voice chat. This feature is only supported for broadband users. Attempting to use voice chat over a modem connexion will result in poor sound quality as well as degraded game play performance. Be sure to use the Microphone Test button below to verify your microphone setup before using voice chat in the game.
